system.description:
You wield significant eldritch power, commanding both powerful magicks and a supernatural servant. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.fqmwv2z4fabmfzsz]{Versatile Blast} Invocation.
  • You gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.8f468d042flyfq8x]{Voice of the Chain Master} invocation, or if you already have it, another Invocation of your choice that you qualify for.
  • You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.eiek2vbzwijd0qac]{Thaumaturgy} cantrip.
  • You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.xnm2hvlfzqp792tz]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.i4ejucvglhqpfm57]{Fog Cloud}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.4rgo85d49qwancup]{Detect Thoughts}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.wbbjargj0lf23adk]{Moonbeam} spells and can cast them normally. They do not count against your spells known and can be either warlock or wielder spells for you as long as the chosen class is capable of casting 2nd-level spells.
  • If your familiar is within 120 feet of you, once per short rest you can teleport to its space as a bonus action. It either shares the space with you or you switch places with it, at your option.
  • You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.bs3wnsid88tbup6c]{Divination} spell and may cast it as a ritual.
  • You can use @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.iq8cqiia40rs54os]{Spellsword} with your warlock spells as well as your wielder ones. Additionally, when you use Spellsword to make an attack after casting a spell, you gain a bonus to hit with the attack equal to half your proficiency modifier.
system.prerequisite: Pactbound Custodian feat, Pact of the Chain, Bonded Artifact is a Font of Power
